name: alibobo-backend
description: Clean backend for Alibobo products API

scripts.start:dev: node scripts/startup-checks-fixed.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development SKIP_INDEX_CREATION=false ENABLE_CLUSTERING=false DEBUG=false node server.js
scripts.start:fast: node scripts/startup-checks-fixed.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development SKIP_INDEX_CREATION=true ENABLE_CLUSTERING=false DEBUG=true node server.js
scripts.start:turbo: node scripts/startup-checks.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development SKIP_INDEX_CREATION=true ENABLE_CLUSTERING=false DEBUG=false MICROCACHE_TTL_MS=2000 node server.js
scripts.start:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node scripts/startup-checks.js && node server.js

author: Alibobo Team
